Transunion and the companies that have paid them XXXX XXXX and XXXX XXXX XXXX has not validated the accounts. Transunion has been advised of this several times and has refused to provide validation. They are required to do so and has refused.These deragatory accounts reporting is falsely representing me as a customer to current and future creditors. It's also damaging for my mental health. It's my understanding each credit bureau is provided the same exact information when the bureau has been PAID to report the account. I have informed you Transunion, XXXX and XXXX has removed the SAME account you are reporting as derogatory. If each credit bureau XXXX, Transunion and XXXX is provided the same information how is it you " claim '' the account is verified? Are you saying you Transunion is the only reputable credit bureau? Please tell me why if you are claiming these accounts are verified why is it so hard to receive validation from Transunion and the companies that have paid you to report them? I have written to Transunion, XXXX XXXX and XXXX XXXX XXXX. I did NOT receive any responses from XXXX or XXXX XXXX XXXX. Again, I have informed Transunion of this and Transunion has did XXXX. Transunion is NOT abiding by the law and has continued to violate my consumer rights! These accounts have NOT been validated therefore they should immediately be removed! I have requested FACTS and VALIDATION Transunion again I ask please provide. I have not received anything from neither company. Alot of time has passed by and my credit is being affected. I have not received a thorough investigation it's more than likely processed by a machine or an overseas overworked employee. It doesn't make sense how I can contact Transunion each time to request information and the response is " verified '' or it'a a stall tactic. Transunion stall tactics as follows ... We are unable to verify your identity we received contact on what we think may be a XXXX party. We have verified the account. The latest I just received an email you received my request to cancel my dispute.How?????? I am and always have contacted Transunion on my own. How is it you are unable to verify me on a dispute but there's no issue with verification to send a full credit report to me with all my information? That doesn't make sense at all! The fake concern is a stall. I have NOT requested no dispute to be canceled I will update a copy of the last 2 letters I sent to Transunion as well as a screenshot of the email I received Transunion claims I requested to cancel the dispute. I did not request the dispute to be canceled. These accounts need to be removed IMMEDIATELY!

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative: So back in XXXX of 2022 we were coming out of forbearance. Upon getting everything ready to restart payments we were offered 2 options. Option 1 was an increase in our interest rate ( 6 % ) and our payments would move up {$300.00}. The second option was to keep our interest rate the same ( 2.25 % ) and resume our normal payments which were {$300.00} lower. I declined option 1 because it didn't make sense to choose over the second option. The Representative at Freedom Mortgage let me know option 1 was declined and that they would be rushing option 2 's paperwork out to us. Once we received the paperwork, we contacted a mobile notary and had the paperwork signed. About a week later I received a second packet in the mail. I called Freedom Morgage right away to make sure I hadn't made a mistake. The representative assured me that the 2nd packet that was sent to me was the same packet as the first one and assured me of the agreed interest rate and payment. Come XXXX I went to log into my account to pay my mortgage and noticed I was a month behind, and my interest rate was at 6 %. Freedom Mortgage told me that a mistake had occurred on their end by sending me the wrong paperwork and they would escalate the situation. I continued to check up on this for around 4-5weeks. Eventually a manager told me to fill out the old 2.25 interest rate paperwork and they would try and have underwriting adjust the start date ( since it had passed ) Underwriting then told them they can't do that and that they would need to send me new paperwork out. So, they went to re-do the paperwork, a few weeks later, they called me to tell me I was approved again, for a 6 % interest rate. We are now back in escalations with Freedom Mortgage and have been told its going to be very hard to turn around. I do have a litigation attorney on standby.

Product: Debt collection
Issue: Attempts to collect debt not owed
Sub-issue: Debt is not yours
Consumer complaint narrative: I received an alert from XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX that there was a collection debt on my XXXX account {$680.00} on XX/XX/2022. I immediately disputed it with the credit Bureau XXXX on this same date. I also wrote and sent a certified dispute letter to the collection agency where the dispute came from on XX/XX/2022 asking for an accurate validation of the debt this agency stated I owe and their right to collect this debt from me. I received a bill from identifying my name and that this agency states that they are in receipt of verifying the referenced account I inquired about. The account was not verified correctly as requested. Credence Resource Management has enclosed to me a XXXX XXXX dated in for a bill period of XXXX XXXX- XXXX XXXX with an account number and amount of the bill in question with and address that I never has lived at. I currently have an account with XXXX so my personal information must have been used to obtain an account in my name. Credence took advantage of this matter and is now trying to collect this amount from me without a proper validation. I believe I have been a victim of identity theft for a charge I did not authorized in my name and the address on the XXXX XXXX is not on my XXXX credit file. There are no signatures stating I made this account valid for collections with this agency. This request is being made in pursuant to the Fair Credit Billing Act Amendments to the Truth in Lending Act. 15 U. S C 1666-1666b, 12 C.F.R, 226.13. I'm requesting for this to be made fair and remove from my credit report because it is damaging to my credit.

I notice my right were violated 15 USC 1681 ( a ) ( 4 ) There is a need to insure that consumer reporting agencies exercise their grave responsibilities with fairness, impartiality, and a respect for the consumers right to privacy. I have the right to privacy as a consumer and I never gave permissible purpose, 15 USC 1681b ( a ) In general Subject to subsection ( c ), any consumer reporting agency may furnish a consumer report under the following circumstances and no other : ( 2 ) In accordance with the written instructions of the consumer to whom it relates. Also 15 USC 1681a ( 2 ) Exclusions.Except as provided in paragraph ( 3 ), the term consumer report does not include ( A ) subject to section 1681s3 of this title, any ( i ) report containing information solely as to transactions or experiences between the consumer and the person making the report ; based off this it shouldn't have been on my credit report so i ask that this account be deleted.

I have submitted 4 complaints informing Experian that I was a victim of identity theft. Experian is failing to block or remove the accounts from my report. I followed their guidelines. I filed a report on the FTC website, I specified how the identity theft took place, that I did not benefit or receive goods or services from the alleged accounts, I validated the identity theft with a federal law enforcement agency ( which they're claiming I haven't ), I submitted the identity theft reports, provided a report circle the fraudulent accounts, an affidavit from the FTC website & provide a photo ID for their records. Experian has claimed the accounts listed below have been verified and are accurate. I'm truly confused by their antics/tactics on how to report this issue but they are ignoring this dispute and failing to comply with the rules set forth in the FCRA. Consumer complaint narrative:
A credit card was fraudulently opened in my name in XX/XX/XXXX with Synchrony Bank. I did not notice the account on my credit report until the account was in default with a balance of approximately {$5000.00} in charges and fees. In XXXX XXXX or XX/XX/XXXX, I contacted the bank and they quickly acknowledged that the account was fraudulent and stopped reporting the account to the credit bureaus under my name/ssn in XX/XX/XXXX. 

In XXXX of XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX ( XXXX ) acquired the debt. At some point in the fall of XXXX, I received correspondence from XXXX regarding this debt. I emailed the contact on the letter, informing them that the debt was not mine and was a case of identity theft. When I continued to receive correspondence from XXXX, in XX/XX/XXXX I sent them a letter via US mail stating clearly that the debt was not mine. 

On XX/XX/XXXX, in response to my letter, XXXX sent me a collection of statements for the account that show my name as the account holder, but which list an address in another state from the one in which I live and is for a property that I had previously owned but had not lived in for more that 8 years and had sold 7 years prior to the fraudulent account being opened. Included in that correspondence from XXXX was a blank affidavit of fraud that XXXX asked that I complete and return, should the account be fraudulent. I completed and signed the affidavit and emailed it back to them on XX/XX/XXXX. I received no response for the email I sent with the affidavit. 

Despite the fact that I have clearly communicated to XXXX both via mail and email that the debt was opened fraudulently in my name, to include providing them with a signed affidavit stating such, on XX/XX/XXXX I received another letter from XXXX in which they are now threatening legal action to collect he debt. 

Contact information that I have on the debt collector : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX UT XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX, XXXX XXXX

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Issue: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem
Sub-issue: Their investigation did not fix an error on your report
Consumer complaint narrative:
On XX/XX/XXXX, I submitted a complaint to the ( SEE CFPB Complaint XXXX attached ) requesting a description of TransUnions investigation against my claim of identity theft. Without justification of their claim of ; my request being made in error, is misrepresentation of material fact relevant to the request to block and/or I have obtained possession of goods, services or money as a result of the transaction issue. their claim has no merit. 

On XX/XX/XXXX, Transunion response ( SEE TransUnions Direct Response attached ) was ; we took one or more of the following action ( s ) : 1. Determined that the data furnisher had previously verified the reported information, 2. Asked the data furnisher reporting the information you disputed to do all of the following : Review relevant information we sent them, including any provided documents. 
Investigate your dispute and verify whether the information they report is accurate. 
Provide us a response to your dispute and update any other information On XX/XX/XXXX, Transunion response ( SEE CFPB Complaint XXXX attached ) was ; we investigated the information by contacting the creditors to verify the accuracy of the information : Transunion ; contacts the data furnisher to verify the accuracy of the information We update or records with the information the creditor provides then we send you the results of the investigation including information of the company that verified the data so you can contact them directly if needed! 

The company that TransUnion sites, claims to have contacted and provided them information was : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  at XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX, GA XXXX ( SEE TransUnions Direct Response attached ) On XX/XX/XXXX, I contacted the company to verify TransUnions above descriptions of their investigation and the company stated ; The United States Bankruptcy Court for the Middle District of Georgia does not report information to any credit agency. ( SEE XXXX COURT MIDDLE GEORGIA Response attached ) So if thats the case. How did TransUnion verify my bankruptcy as 100 % Accurate? Where is the information the creditor provided? 

TransUnion has yet to provide evidence of a fair investigation according to 15 USC 1681 section 603 ( 3 ) ( E ) which states ; The term investigative consumer report means a consumer report or portion thereof in which information on a consumers character, general reputation, personal characteristics, or mode of living is obtained through personal interviews with neighbors, friends, or associates of the consumer reported on or with others with whom he is acquainted or who may have knowledge concerning any such items of information. However, such information shall not include specific factual information on a consumers credit record obtained directly from a creditor of the consumer or from a consumer reporting agency when such information was obtained directly from a creditor of the consumer or from the consumer.

This is yet again another violation of my rights including : 15 U.S.C 1681 section 602 A, which states I have the right to privacy, 15 U.S.C 1681 Section 604 A Section 2, which states a consumer reporting agency can not furnish an account without my written instructions. Also, 15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ( A ) ( 1 ) A person shall not furnish any information relating to a consumer to any consumer reporting agency if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccurate.

Consumer complaint narrative: I opened an secured credit card account XX/XX/2021 with Navy Federal credit union for the total amount of XXXX funded with cash to build credit and I was told after XXXX months that I would be consider for a unsecured account in XXXX months after a review with the bank. I was also told if I was approved that they would match whatever had had in my savings account and add that to my secured credit card, so with that in mind I decided to put an additional XXXX on to my credit card to increase the amount to XXXX on XXXX XXXX I was approve for the increase and there was no issues. I noticed about a month later that my savings account was in the negative of {$2900.00} but me not having experienced with credit cards I assumed that it was an error on the bank end and went on with my life. Navy Federal never contacted me, Never sent an overdraft letter in regards to my account being overdraft. I didn't take the negative amount seriously until I called in asking information on how I can increase my chances of getting approve for an unsecured credit care three months after I signed up for the card and that's when the representative told me that I was reponsible for the negative account and wouldn't be elgible for the unsecured credit card until it was paid. I told her that that couldn't be accurate because the {$3000.00} was made and if it wasn't how why did Navy federal allow me to utilize the XXXX and charge me interest on the money for several months if the account was not in good standing or if they never received the initial required payment for the card to be issued. I got the run around, I got I don't know, I got well when we went in to take the funds out of the checking/savings account the XXXX was there so that's why your account is in the negative, so I said well it must have been a computer error or the payment was actually applied to the account through the the system by ach transfer allowing the XXXX limit increase and she said no we never received the payment. I contact serveral associates including branch managers and also requested an investigations on where my XXXX XXXX dollars went if they didn't get the payment and all I got was a packet of bank states for a year but nothing showing that XXXX XXXX dollars was not applied to the credit card. I am writing this complaint because I get at least three calls a week from navy federal in regards to this credit card and every time I tell them why I am not paying they still cant resolved the issues and I am still responsible for interest rates, late payment ect. I want this issues solved in a fair manner and I want all my money back plus interest.

Consumer complaint narrative:
XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, TX XXXX Subject : XXXX RE : Partial Account Number : XXXX. 
VIN Number : XXXX To whom it may concern, I am aware that the FCRA allows for creditors to report but they have to be compliant and accurate at all times. My concern with this account is this. It is reported on my consumer report that this alleged debt was charged off. However, based on the notice of late payment required to be given to a consumer by the FCRA, I did not receive a late notice within five ( 5 ) business days nor was notified that XXXX XXXX XXXX will be putting a negative remark on my consumer report. 

Also, based on the Fair Credit Billing Act, XXXX XXXX XXXX failed to provide me an up to date balance during the month ( s ) that this alleged debt was reported as late so how am I able to make sure the balance was not modified or misrepresented during that time causing a calculated error and in turn, caused the account to be late? How do I know that surcharges were not billed by mistake and that you were accurate while reporting? Can you please provide me with these details.

Additionally, according to the IRS, a 1099-C was to be sent in accordance with this chargeoff as it is over XXXX However, one was not sent. Also, since the alleged debt was charged off, why are you still trying to collect on the alleged debt? Is that not considered fraud and abusive activity according to the FCRA? 



Again, according to the FCRA, all creditors MUST be compliant and accurate when reporting and I feel that XXXX XXXX XXXX failed in doing so.This account is inaccurate and XXXX XXXX XXXX had an obligation to the FCRA to tell me if I was going to be late and that you were going to post a negative remark on my consumer report. You also had an obligation to send me a 1099-C in which you failed to do so. With you reporting this account on my consumer report, it is considered an illegal report and in connection with the XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX will be in violation of certain codes equating to XXXX  per violation. 

Failure to respond satisfactorily with deletion of the above referenced account, and send out a free copy of my report after the changes have been made will result in legal actions being taken against your company, for which I will also be seeking XXXX per violation for : Defamation of Character ( per se ) Injury to person Negligent Enablement of Identity Fraud Fair Debt Collections Practices Act 15 USC 1692g violations.

Fair Credit Reporting Act 15 USC 1681 violations for willful noncompliance - 616. Civil liability for willful noncompliance [ 15 U.S.C. 1681n ] This account is inaccurate and I am demanding that it be removed from my consumer report. 

SEND CORRESPONDENCE TO THE ADDRESS PROVIDED BELOW : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX 
XXXX, TX XXXX Without ill-will or animosity, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX With Prejudice

Consumer complaint narrative: I have disputed the referenced accounts to the 3 main credit bureaus and do not owe your company anything. I dont know this company and I do not recall ever having this debt and appears to be fraud, see attached FTC Report. Moreover, no adequate information has been given and noticed these accounts appear to violate my rights as well, per 15 USC 1692 ( e ) ( f ) ( g ). Moreover, you stated the account was verified as accurate by law 15 USC 1681 ( e ). Per 15 USC 1681 ( e ) The term investigative consumer report means a consumer report or portion thereof in which information on a consumers character, general reputation, personal characteristics, or mode of living is obtained through personal interviews with neighbors, friends, or associates of the consumer reported on or with others with whom he is acquainted or who may have knowledge concerning any such items of information. However, such information shall not include specific factual information on a consumers credit record obtained directly from a creditor of the consumer or from a consumer reporting agency when such information was obtained directly from a creditor of the consumer or from the consumer. Investigations weren't completed as described by law and no factual information should be on credit reports. Im requesting the removal of accounts and/or monetary compensation due to violations of my rights. Im currently seeking litigation regarding consistent harassment, unfair debt practices, adding without my permission/authorization within 5 days, and more. As the original creditor, only I can validate the debt therefore Im requesting removal and this account violates my consumer rights in several ways. Please remove and provide some updates within 4 days of receipt, as this has been ongoing for over 3-4 months.

Procedure in case of disputed accuracy [ 15 U.S.C. 1681i ] ( a ) Reinvestigations of disputed information.

( 1 ) Reinvestigation required.

( A ) In general. If the completeness or accuracy of any item of information contained in a consumer 's file at a consumer reporting agency is disputed by the consumer and the consumer notifies the agency directly of such dispute, the agency shall reinvestigate free of charge and record the current status of the disputed information, or delete the item from the file in accordance with paragraph ( 5 ), before the end of the 30-day period beginning on the date on which the agency receives the notice of the dispute from the consumer or reseller.

Consumer complaint narrative: This is not a duplicate nor is this complaint filed by a third party. I am filing this complaint myself. Please see this complaint is processed to the letter of the law. Despite the multiple previous written requests, the unverified items listed below still remain on my credit report in violation of Federal Law. You are required under the FCRA to have a copy of the original creditor documentation on file to verify that this information is 100 % true, accurate & correct. In the results of your first investigation and subsequent reinvestigation ( s ), you stated in writing that you verified that these items are being reported correctly? Who verified these accounts? You have NOT provided me a copy of ANY original documentation ( a consumer contract with my signature on it ) as required under Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) & Section 611 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ). Furthermore, you have failed to provide the method of verification as required under Section 611 ( a ) ( 7 ). Please be advised that under Section 611 ( a ) ( 5 ) ( A ) of the FCRA you are required to ... promptly CORRECT or DELETE all information which can not be verified. Section 616 and Section 617 provide me with a remedy which Im about to seek. You are willful non-complying with the FCRA. Since you claim youve verified the accounts listed below I wanted to confirm my thoughts and contacted the companies directly. They did not provide me with any verifiable proof. So, my question comes up again, WHO VERIFIED THESE ACCOUNTS? I believe you have not verified these accounts based on Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) & Section 611 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) & I will be seeking a legal remedy. Please have these accounts corrected for once : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX

Consumer complaint narrative:
XX/XX/2022 To Whom This May Concern XX/XX/2022, I received a letter from the Federal courthouse stating they do not report bankruptcies to the credit bureaus nor to any other individuals. This being the case, How did the credit bureaus verify my bankruptcy as 100 % Accurate. They never did a fair investigation according to the 15 USC 1681.

15 USC 1681 section 603 ( 3 ) ( E ) states : The term INVESTIGATIVE CONSUMER REPORT means a consumer report or portion thereof in which information on a consumers character general reputation characteristic or mode of living is obtained through personal interviews with neighbors, friends, or associates of the consumer reported on or with others with whom he is acquainted or who may have knowledge concerning any such items of information. However, such information shall not include specific factual information on a consumers credit report obtained directly from a creditor of the consumer or from a consumer reporting agency when such information was obtained directly from a creditor of the consumer or from the consumer.

My rights have been violated several times.

The credit bureaus violated my given rights under 15 USC 1681 According to 15 U.S.C. 1681 section 602 A. States I have the right to privacy.

According to 15 U.S.C. 1681 section 604 A Section 2 also states a consumer reporting agency can not furnish an account without written instructions.

According to 15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ( A ) ( 1 ) A person shall not furnish any information relating to a consumer to any consumer reporting agency, if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccurate.

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative:
To All Concerned : I need to tell you how processs put in place actually fail for the person they are meant to protect. 
This is how Hurricane Mathew ( 2016 ) affected me. 
The failures I will to bring to light are that of Wells Fargo Mortgage ( WFM ), Wells Fargo Flood Zone Department ( WFF ) and Federal Emergency Management Agency ( FEMA ).

I will start with the failures of Wells Fargo as my mortgage company. I will quickly explain how they cheated me out my asset, a rental home, through unprofessional and unethical behavior and trickery.

The flood zone department of Wells Fargo refused to believe my house was in a flood zone. XXXX, I have no flood insurance. In 2016 Hurricane Matthew came through XXXX XXXX and destroys my house. Uninhabitable as eleven feet of water went through that property. 
My property is at XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX, North Carolina. I purchased the property in XXXX as a XXXX in the XXXX stationed at XXXX XXXX, NC. It was uniquely situated on the property and had a staircase of 30 steps leading from the top of the street down to the house. Because of that feature a flood zone examination request was done and it was shown at that time not to be in the flood zone. 
In XXXX, my insurance company ( XXXX ) notified me that flood zones had shifted and FEMA had new maps out. XXXX believed my home on XXXX XXXX was now in a flood zone. Although I had the house rented out, I should still carry the flood insurance. They informed me that I should be hearing from my mortgage company since it is a federal law to require me to have flood insurance while still paying on a mortgage. Although XXXX does not carry flood insurance, I could purchase it from FEMA. I contacted WFM and relayed what XXXX XXXX told me about needing flood insurance. WFM states they do not have information XXXXXXXX XXXX is in a flood zone and referred me to the WFF. WFF states that my home is NOT in a flood zone and I DO NOT need flood insurance. He added that XXXX was trying to sell me more insurance. 
Nine years later in XX/XX/XXXX, Hurricane Matthew comes thru XXXX XXXX and brings eleven feet of water through my little piece of property. The house that I had been renting out is now uninhabitable. I am very grateful the tenets had the sense to get out of there when the house, built five feet off the ground started taking in water. Inside the house took on six feet of water, everything ruined. 
XX/XX/XXXX, I called the Wells Fargo Mortgage Company, spoke with the flood department again about XXXX being in a flood zone. They maintained my property at XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX NC was not in a flood zone. I told them my house was hit hard and flooded, the WFF point of contact still maintained that house was not in a flood zone.

I placed a formal compliant through Wells Fargo and asked for an investigation on the subject. They found that the WFF did maintain my house was not in a flood zone although it had been completely flooded. I had to speak with the flood zone guy to start any type of resolution and it took months. I called weekly for several months only to be met with stone- wall tactics of we dont know, we will get back with you, he is not here. Sometime in the spring of XXXX I was contacted by an attorney representing WFF. He said he would be my POC on the issue.

This attorney was only interested in protecting the WFF guy who said I did not need flood insurance. It took a couple of months for him to provide any type of offer. it takes months to arrive at any solution... it took months. Months of me calling weekly, all sorts of stall tactics used by Wells Fargo flood department. Did they think I would give up and go away? 

My insurance company valued that home at XXXX at that time. The first FEMA inspector that came thru valued it at fair market value of XXXX. Wells Fargo would not hear of it... they dont believe that those two assessments are credible and came up with a value of XXXX. They agreed to pay me XXXX if I turned around and paid off the XXXX I still owed. If I had an attorney, you can believe Wells Fargo would have to make this right FEMA- Wow, I can not think of a worst way to dole out taxpayer dollars to help folks out ... .untrained people that lack knowledge of any of the programs... i wont bore you with the nearly five years of being lead by the nose of better days are coming for you.. However, I will say this ; Please embed attorneys in FEMA that can help someone like me. If I could have made Wells Fargo step up and be accountable, I dont need tax payer dollars. FEMA did not ever ask if my mortgage company made me have flood insurance! Come to find out, the flood maps did change in XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX was the only house on the street in the flood zone, but it was in the flood zone!

Why is the FEMA system not set up to help folks like me? How hard would that be to offer legal service. They had volunteer attorneys but they couldnt do anything for me. Why not?

That house was three years from being paid off. Then, the rent would supplement my retirement income. It was to allow for annual trips with the grandkids... it was worth keeping up and keeping rented, because of that income stream. Its gone... no hope of getting it back. Wells Fargo gets away with treating me like nothing and having my VERY hard earned money go down the drain. 
Not only do a only get a fraction of the value, and I was only asking for fair market value at XXXX, but I lost a very valuable to me, income stream for my retirement! 
Processes are broken. I hope the XXXX XXXX bans Wells Fargo to military personal. 


Regards XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX

Consumer complaint narrative: As per my federally protected rights under the FCRA, UDAAP, and CFRs, TransUnion and XXXX is reporting and alleged " collection account '' with XXXX XXXX to be reported on my credit report. Under the law a " collection account '' is considered income under the law and should thus not be reporting as a debt. Additionally, the account is incorrectly listed as both " open '' and a " collection account '' which under the law is a violation since I am entitled to " maximum accuracy '' on all three credit reports reported by all three CRAs. This account is also currently NOT reporting on my XXXX credit report thus I do not currently have " maximum accuracy '' across all three CRAs.. Reporting of this account is also in violation of 16 CFR 313.10 which states that I have right to not have my nonpublic personal information disclosed to a non-affiliate. By fact that the original creditor sold my nonpublic personal information, without my written consent, to XXXX XXXX they violated the XXXX. Additionally, because the debt was in fact sold to XXXX XXXX, it is no longer debt and has thus converted to income. I have no financial relationship nor contractual obligation with XXXX XXXX. The reporting of this account on my XXXX and TransUnion credit report is also in violation of The Privacy Act of 1974. This account is also in violation of my federally protected right under 15 USC 1681a ( 2 ) ( i ) which states that the consumer report 's rules of construction have EXCEPTIONS which include the transaction history between " the consumer and the person making the report ''. It also violates 15 USC 1681b, 15 USC 1681c, 15 USC 1681d, and 15 USC 1681f, and 15 USC 1681g. This account also violates UDAAP, specifically " deceptive and abusive practices '' because XXXX XXXX is listed on my credit report as " COLLECTION AGENCY/ATTORNEY ''. Yet, XXXX XXXX is NOT an attorney and thus are misrepresenting themselves to deliberately mislead me as a consumer.

The email told me to print out and deposit the check. Then the scammer texted me asking to send them {$500.00} through XXXX  and that I would be reimbursed the next day. Reluctantly, I sent them the money after speaking to them on the phone and them saying that they will send it the following day. Consumer complaint narrative:
This is not a duplicate complaint and I'm representing myself, by myself. This complaint due to the new evidence and new issue on my credit report. I have obtained my credit report from XXXX XXXX and Transunion has listed accounts on my report that I can't recognize. 
The accounts that are being disputed, does not belong to me. The below is my sworn statement concerning these credit issues. 

It is my sworn statement that, I declare under penalty of perjury ( under the laws of the United States, if executed outside of the United States ) that the foregoing is true and correct to the best of my knowledge. Further, I certify that I am qualified and authorized to file this dispute. I also understand that knowing and a willful misstatement of omissions of material facts constitutes a federal criminal violation punishable under 18 U.S.C. 1001. Additionally, these misstatements are punishable as perjury under 18 U.S.C. 1621. 
The items below are items currently within my credit file, and none of these are related to any transaction that was made by me. It is my official statement that someone and/or several people have opened these accounts and made transactions on this accounts without my knowledge or authorization, my personal information has been used to obtain goods, services, or money : and the person ( s ) responsible for creating this account. 

I have filed a report with the Federal Trade Commission, which I have enclosed within this dispute package. The law says that you must block these accounts while being investigated, and I expect that you will do so. 
In accordance with the Fair Credit Reporting act. The list of accounts below has violated my federally protected consumer rights to privacy and confidentiality 15 USC 1681. Account name : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXX/XX/XXXX 15 U.S.C. 1681 Section 602 A. States I have the right to privacy. 15U.S.C 1681 Section 604 A Section 2 : It also states a consumer reporting agency can not furnish an account without my written instructions. 15 U.S.C. 1681c. ( a ) ( 5 ) Section States : no consumer reporting agency may make any consumer report containing any of the following items of information Any other adverse of information, other than records of convictions of crimes which antedates the report by more than seven years. 15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ( A ) ( 1 ) A person shall not furnish any information relating to any consumer reporting agency if the person knowns or has reasonable causes to believe that the information is inaccurate.

According to the FAIR CREDIT REPORTING ACT FCRA 611 ( 15 U.S.C. 1681 ), Procedure In Case of Disputed Accuracy. Reinvestigations of Disputed Information 1. Reinvestigation Required ( a ) In general. Subject to Subsection ( f ), if the completeness or accuracy of any item of information contained in a consumers file at a consumer agency is disputed by the consumer and the consumer notifies the agency directly, or indirectly through a reseller, of such dispute, free of charge, conduct a reasonable reinvestigation to determine whether the disputed information is inaccurate and record the current status of the disputed information, or delete the item from the file in accordance with paragraph ( 5 ), before the end of the 30-day period beginning on the date on which the agency receives the notice of the dispute from the consumer or reseller. 
I am well aware of my rights as a consumer. The Fair Credit Reporting Act requires that you, the credit-reporting agency, report accurate and/or correct account information within my credit file. My credit issues are very specific, this account doesn't belong to me. This means that you are reporting incorrect account information within my credit report. It is with this in mind that I request that this listed account and items be BLOCKED and DELETED!

Consumer complaint narrative:
Despite the multiple previous written requests, the unverified items listed below still remain on my credit report in violation of Federal Law. You are required under the FCRA to have a copy of the original creditor documentation on file to verify that this information is 100 % true, accurate & correct. In the results of your first investigation and subsequent reinvestigation ( s ), you stated in writing that you verified that these items are being reported correctly? Who verified these accounts? You have NOT provided me a copy of ANY original documentation ( a consumer contract with my signature on it ) as required under Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) & Section 611 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ). Furthermore, you have failed to provide the method of verification as required under Section 611 ( a ) ( 7 ). Please be advised that under Section 611 ( a ) ( 5 ) ( A ) of the FCRA you are required to ... promptly CORRECT or DELETE all information which can not be verified.

Section 616 and Section 617 provide me with a remedy which Im about to seek. You are willful non-complying with the FCRA.

Since you claim youve verified the accounts listed below I wanted to confirm my thoughts and contacted the companies directly. They did not provide me with any verifiable proof. So, my question comes up again, WHO VERIFIED THESE ACCOUNTS? I believe you have not verified these accounts based on Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) & Section 611 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) & I will be seeking a legal remedy. 

Please correct the accounts, or inaccurate information, from my file immediately XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX

Consumer complaint narrative:
This will be my first and last attempt to remove these unauthorized accounts from my consumer report before involving civil institutions. Under 15 U.S Code 1681b - Permissible purposes of consumer reports any consumer reporting agency may furnish a consumer report under the following circumstances and no other, the written instructions of the consumer to whom it relates. I never gave that consent, which violates my privacy. Second, according to 15 U.S. Code 6802, I have the right to opt out of reporting if non-public information is being furnished. One, I was not disclosed of that right by the creditor to opt out, Nor is the contract between the creditor and I public information. Per law, identity theft means non-consent. Please provide substantial documentation validating consent to furnish these accounts. Please block and delete the listed items immediately. 

I am writing to delete the following information in my file. The items I need deleted are listed in the report. 
I am a victim of identity theft and did not make the charge. I ask that the items be deleted to correct my credit report. 
I reported the theft of my identity to the Federal Trade Commission and I also have enclosed copies of the Federal Trade Commissions Identity Theft Affidavit. Please delete the items as soon as possible.

Issue: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem
Sub-issue: Their investigation did not fix an error on your report
Consumer complaint narrative:
I wish to file a complaint on Experian and XXXX XXXX because Experian has VERIFIED this account as ACCURATE and Updated this account on XX/XX/XXXX report number XXXX. To my understanding if a account has been verified as accurate then shouldnt all reported information be accurate and complete? Experian didnt even provide me a BEFORE and AFTER results instead I had to get a new report following experians verified as accurate results for the updates and my updated report still reflects inaccurate and incomplete information. See below. 

XXXX XXXX XXXX ERRORS and INCOMPLETE information on my XX/XX/XXXX report number XXXX On Record Until XX/XX/XXXX - ( XXXX has provided me with the date of XX/XX/XXXX due to disconnect for Non Pay in there response letter on XX/XX/XXXX. XX/XX/XXXX is the date of commencement that lead to the delinquency status therefore under 1681c ( c ) ( 1 ) the 7 year reporting period begins on the month and year this item went into delinquency. If XX/XX/XXXX is the date XXXX XXXX disconnected service due to non pay then XXXX should be the Month this account is set to be Federally removal with the respected 7 year time frame of XX/XX/XXXX NOT XX/XX/XXXX. 

XXXX XXXX- the payment history is INCOMPLETE. There is NO Last Payment, NO Date of commencement of the Deliquency, NO Late Pays ( XXXX, C/O ). All that reports is a XXXX off XX/XX/XXXX in which I dont even know if that is accurate or not because the payment history is incomplete. There are additional random charge offs reporting also with ND ( NO DATA ) in the payment history as well. NO DATA is STILL INCOMPLETE INFORMATION. If the payment history does NOT include such important information then how is it possible that experian is coming up with the On Record Until date? How are they determining that information when the source has given me the same information they give experian to report? 

This account should have never been Verified as XXXX instead this account should have been updated properly in order to be considered verified as accurate. I do not believe experian is conducting proper reasonable compliance procedures to assure my report is of maximum possible accuracy. XXXX XXXX has done there part by including a notice of dispute and providing me with information in regards to information, however Experian has failed to report what XXXX XXXX has given to them and I have given Experian a respectful amount of time to fix such errors. I have been disputing this account with experian since XX/XX/XXXX and this account continues to be reported inaccurately with incomplete information. 

I would like to include that the account number XXXX XXXX has provided me on there response letter has XXXX digits and experian is reporting a XXXX digit account number. Experian is still furnishing inaccurate and incomplete information after XXXX has given me a notice of dispute directly on XX/XX/XXXX therefore Experian should be reporting the same information.

Product: Money transfer, virtual currency, or money service
Consumer complaint narrative:
Around XX/XX/2022 and on two separate occasions, I ( made significant financial transfers from my XXXX XXXX bank account using Crypto.com as the intermediary foreign exchange to accounts in my name listed within the XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX. The XXXX web site at the time claimed that XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX was a trading platform for the purpose of buying and selling currencies. Within this platform, I initially held a trading account with the XXXX XXXX XXXX - XXXX. In Late XXXX ( about XX/XX/XXXX ), that account was transferred to a new account with XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  Conducting XXXX  trading activities in both these accounts, I amassed some profits according to the information that they provided me but when I attempted to withdraw my large initial investment from the XXXX XXXX account, I ran into delays and bogus tax requirements that prevented me from withdrawing not only my " profits '' ( if they were ever real ) but also my initial investment. In short, I never received the services that XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ( hereafter XXXX ) offered on their web page and learned, after some internet research, concluded that I was the victim of a totally fraudulent investment scheme. When I challenged the actions of XXXX XXXX XXXX regarding the bogus tax requirement that they levied before they would release my funds, I received no help. This caused me to conclude that I was the victim of a scam and that the profits I thought I had amassed were not real but rather, fabrications designed to get me and other like me to invest money in these XXXX based entities. I realized at that point that going. after the XXXX firms for redress was unlikely to yield further success, so I turned my attention to Crypto.com, the exchange agent that sent my funds to the XXXX XXXX XXXX account. As a dealer in international currencies, I felt that Crypto.com had a fiduciary responsibility to ensure, to the best of their ability, that funds were being transferred to legitimate entities in order to protect their customer 's interests ( there were fees associated with the crypto.com service ). I wrote a letter to Crypto.com that laid all this out and requested redress from crypto.com for failure to. protect my funds by ensuring that they went to a legitimate entity. In an email response, they denied all responsibility. 

Throughout this saga, my dealings with the XXXX agent who was offering me instruction and investing advice, I had no idea that I was potentially dealing with a fraudulent scheme until late XXXX. The agent instructing me in how to invest in currency using the XXXX XXXX XXXX and ( later ) XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX used my lack of knowledge and the processing of my payments through Crypto.com to create an air of overall legitimacy that, of course, proved not to be true. This was the first time I had any dealings with Crypto.com and cryptocurrency in general. I was manipulated and deceived for over a month, and I am confident that if I had suspected the scam during this time, I would have stopped the transactions. However, I was receiving constant lies and cleverly fabricated documentation from the scammers. I was told that Crypto.com as a currency exchange was a temporary payment processor, which after some research I believed because Crypto.com does provide payment services. However, I was saddened to learn ( after the fact ) that Crypto.com didnt perform any security checks to validate the legitimacy of entities to which their clients were sending funds. As a major player in the XXXX XXXX XXXX, Crypto.com either knew or should have known of fraudulent investing schemes such as this and had a responsibility to warn consumers of the general dangers involved or and the specific dangers in dealing with firms such as XXXX XXXX XXXX and XXXX XXXX XXXX. Instead, they simply took their frees and passed my funds along.

Consumer complaint narrative:
Wells Fargo Home Mortgage : ( XXXX ) XXXX Fax : ( XXXX ) XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX, IA XXXX I recently, 2 months ago received info regarding my mortgage will reset in XX/XX/XXXX as it was a 7 year year ARM.! This has totally caught me off guard as i have never asked for an ARM type of mortgage! My monthly payment will go from {$1700.00} to over {$2200.00} and possibly as high as {$2700.00}! I never asked for this type of mortgage back in XX/XX/XXXX as it was a replacement for an ARM that i already had with another company. I specifically asked for fixed rate as i mentioned and stressed to them that I retiring in 2 years which i did in XXXX. Made numerous call but with no progress. Please see below latest interaction event with them 1. Contacted XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX in XX/XX/XXXX, she recommended do nothing and wait until XX/XX/XXXX. 
XXXX. Contacted Home Mortgage Main Office in XXXX XXXX in XX/XX/XXXX ( XXXX ) XXXX talked to a rep, then transffered to another Customer Service. Later on she checked with a third department telling me, I have to wait until the increase the payment, then call a department Home Preservation Tel # XXXX they can work on it. Well Fargo wanted me to wait and had no interest in resolving the issue in advance! 

Background relevant Information 1. Loan was taken on XX/XX/XXXX for $ XXXX to replace an ARM loan with XXXX which I was paying {$1100.00} interest only per month. ( Interest rate was 3.3 % ) XXXX. There were no equity taken and the ratio of the loan to the house value was about 60 % way below what they were looking for to secure the loan. 
3. My Current fixed mortgage payment with Wells Fargo is {$1700.00} per month ( Principal & Interest at interest rate of 3.5 % ) 4. I Was told that no house appraisal will be needed due to the very high equity on the house and I am not taking any money out of the refinance. Wells Fargo bank changed this and I was forced to pay for their appraisal. 
XXXX. I have requested XXXX line of credit with the loan and it was verbally approved, but later on found out I was misled and it is only XXXX! 
XXXX. I have requested and made it clear I wanted a Fixed Interest Loan for the following reason : A. I will be retiring with 2 years. 
XXXX I am replacing an ARM type of loan and it did not make any sense to pay all the fees and do another refinance later on. 
XXXX I also had another ARM type of loan from Wells Fargo on a different property and the payment kept on increasing every year and eventually I had to sell the property I feel i was misled and lied on by Wells Fargo whom i rusted and banked with over 37 years!!

Issue: Received a loan you didn't apply for
Consumer complaint narrative:
I had been in an incredibly tight situation where I applied for a loan of {$500.00}, and I received a statement stating that I would have a loan with an APR of around 39 percent. I thought that was fine because my credit is terrible, but I couldnt download the PDF, but it didnt matter because I was in a state of urgency to cover unexpected expenses. 

I saw that my total cost for the loan would be {$1000.00} and some odd change. I however, on signing, could not log into my account for two days, could not verify anything, tried to correct an incorrect payment date on the email I received and on logging back in, I saw that the loan amount was for {$3200.00} and the APR skyrocketed to 762 % I tried to correct this, I looked into them on the XXXX XXXX XXXX, and every response theyve given to anyone complaining about their experience has been about how theyre on tribal grounds and thus exempt from the surrounding laws and cant be touched. They tore XXXX XXXX XXXX from me and I cant get it back, I managed to block their payments after they were eating the entirety of my weekly paychecks as XXXX XXXX XXXX but it still got so much that I havent been able to pay rent for the past two months I want to go through and find a way to make sure they can never do this to anyone else and this complaint is one of the ways Im trying to do exactly that

RightPath Servicing has fraudulently assessed me for insurance. 
A letter sent to me dated XX/XX/XXXX, from RightPath Servicing, claimed my Home Owners insurance had expired, of which it did not. 
Proof of insurance was emailed, by me, to the email address listed in the letter stating, If you prefer you may update your HAZARD coverage information at XXXX. I emailed a copy of my hazard insurance on XX/XX/XXXX at XXXX. 
A second letter was sent by RightPath Servicing, stating, This is your second and final notice to obtain insurance or provide RightPath Servicing proof of insurance, as our records show that your HAZARD insurance expired and we do not have evidence that you have obtained new coverage. Because HAZARD insurance is required on your property, we plan to buy insurance for your property. 
I emailed RightPath Servicing, again, on XX/XX/XXXX, providing them proof of HAZARD insurance coverage. 

I have acknowledged receiving letters from RightPath Servicing that were sent on XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX. I have NEVER received a letter from RightPath Servicing dated XX/XX/XXXX, in fact, the first time I saw this letter was on XX/XX/XXXX when RightPath Servicing attached it to a response to my complaint filed on XX/XX/XXXX. RightPath Servicing had not provided this XXXX letter in response to previous complaints I had filed, including the complaint ( filed XX/XX/XXXX ) they responded to on XX/XX/XXXX, because its obvious that this letter did not exist before XX/XX/XXXX. 
The first time I became aware of RightPath Servicing assessing me for H06 insurance was in XXXX, as this was the first time my monthly mortgage payment statement reflected an assessment for FPI ( Forced Placed Insurance ). My XXXX mortgage payment statement amount was not changed to reflect the purchase of insurance ( H06 ) and neither was my XXXX mortgage statement. 
I immediately purchased XXXX insurance in XXXX, as this was the FIRST time it was brought to my attention that RightPath Servicing was requiring XXXX insurance AND NOT hazard insurance, as their letters of intent to purchase insurance on my behalf had consistently claimed HAZARD insurance. 

HAZARD INSURANCE, as defined by all major insurance providers is : HAZARD INSURANCE Nationwide Insurance What is hazard insurance? 
Hazard insurance generally refers to coverage for the structure of your home only. Other kinds of damage will be covered by other coverages within your homeowners insurance policy. Hazard insurance doesnt generally refer to the coverage that protects you for injuries incurred by you or your guests following an accident XXXX be covered by liability coverage. 
The reason hazard insurance is a common term is actually because of lenders. Your mortgage loan provider XXXX require hazard insurance at minimum before they will issue you a loan, because that is the only portion of the homeowners insurance policy directly related to the home structure itself. This XXXX create the misconception that hazard coverage can be purchased separately from homeowners insurance, which is not accurate. If your lender has specified that you need hazard or dwelling coverage, just know that generally purchasing a homeowners policy will satisfy their requirements. 

RightPath Servicing should now be investigated by the CFPB for their deliberate intent to fraud. The proof in their provided communications is irrefutable, they claimed I needed to purchase HAZARD INSURANCE and then placed a XXXX insurance policy on my property which, as its clear, is NOT hazard insurance. 

I am requesting an investigation into XXXX XXXX actions and to give strong consideration to their history of misconduct and millions paid in sanctions, under different entities.

Product: Debt collection
Sub-issue: Didn't receive enough information to verify debt
Consumer complaint narrative:
Two weeks ago I received a notification/alert from XXXX XXXX Identity Theft Protection that an account in the amount of XXXX had been opened in my name. I had not opened one so I called them. They verified that an account had been opened by XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ( " XXXX '' ), XXXX, MA phone number XXXX XXXX XXXX. 

I had no idea what this was about so I called them and they said I owed XXXX. They told me it was due to XXXX XXXX and that it was for my address in XXXX. I said I don't live in XXXX and they told me the address in XXXX. That was my son 's former apartment. He has not lived there in more than XXXX XXXX, but sublet the apartment up until XXXX XXXX XXXX. Apparently the bill was for the final gas bill. When he got the apartment, XXXX XXXX wanted to use my name as he had little credit history. ( I have not seen the bill, so I can only assume that the bill and amount are both correct and that I owed this amount. ) I told XXXX I never received the bill. They told me several copies of the bill had been sent and I asked where ; the bills had been sent to that XXXX address. I explained that no one was at the apartment who could have received it. I told them that I wanted to see the bill ( have not received it yet ), but to resolve this quickly because it went on my credit report, I paid it. 

It is quite disturbing that they would report me to the credit bureaus without trying to contact me at my correct address or call me about it. I learned from XXXX today that my score dropped XXXX points on account of this, as it falls into the very negative category of collections. I was about to apply for a personal loan and this impacts me financially quite severely. I checked with the two other credit bureaus and found similar effects. I have filed disputes with each of the agencies. 

This is unacceptable, predatory behavior and would ask that you investigate XXXX and reprimand them or censure them, or take other appropriate legal action. I am an XXXX ( I do not do consumer finance ), so I will have to see if this will have lasting impact. If this account remains on my credit report, I will strongly consider filing a suit agains XXXX. There is no way a credit report filing should follow on a debt that is not that old and when no one used due diligence to locate me and send me the bill at my correct address.

XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  XXXX has violated my rights.

15 U.S.C 1681 section 602 A. State I have the right to privacy.

15 U.S.C 1681 section 604 A section 2 : it also states a consumer reporting agency can not furnish account without my written instructions.

15 U.S.C 1681c. ( a ) ( 5 ) Section States : no consumer reporting agency may make any consumer report containing any of the following items of information. Any other adverse item of information, other than records of conviction of crimes which antedates the report by more than seven years.

15 U.S.C 1681s-2 ( A ) ( 1 ) A person shall not furnish any information relating to a consumer to any consumer reporting agency if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccrate.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Issue: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem
Sub-issue: Was not notified of investigation status or results
Consumer complaint narrative: I have disputed the referenced accounts to the 3 main credit bureaus and do not owe your company anything. I dont know this company and I do not recall ever having this debt and appears to be fraud, see attached FTC Report. Moreover, no adequate information has been given and noticed these accounts appear to violate my rights as well, per 15 USC 1692 ( e ) ( f ) ( g ). Moreover, you stated the account was verified as accurate by law 15 USC 1681 ( e ). Per 15 USC 1681 ( e ) The term investigative consumer report means a consumer report or portion thereof in which information on a consumers character, general reputation, personal characteristics, or mode of living is obtained through personal interviews with neighbors, friends, or associates of the consumer reported on or with others with whom he is acquainted or who may have knowledge concerning any such items of information. However, such information shall not include specific factual information on a consumers credit record obtained directly from a creditor of the consumer or from a consumer reporting agency when such information was obtained directly from a creditor of the consumer or from the consumer. Investigations weren't completed as described by law and no factual information should be on credit reports. Im requesting the removal of accounts and/or monetary compensation due to violations of my rights. Im currently seeking litigation regarding consistent harassment, unfair debt practices, adding without my permission/authorization within 5 days, and more. As the original creditor, only I can validate the debt therefore Im requesting removal and this account violates my consumer rights in several ways. Please remove and provide some updates within 4 days of receipt, as this has been ongoing for over 3-4 months.
